changeSet.createView: with flight_log_monthly_total_no_id as ( select trunc(flight_date, 'month') as month, round(sum(day_solo), 1) day_solo, round(sum(day_dual), 1) day_dual, round(sum(night_solo), 1) night_solo, round(sum(night_dual), 1) night_dual, round(sum(instrument_simulated), 1) instrument_simulated, round(sum(instrument_flight_sim), 1) instrument_flight_sim, round(sum(instrument_imc), 1) instrument_imc, sum(instrument_no_ifr_appr) instrument_no_ifr_appr, round(sum(x_country_day), 1) x_country_day, round(sum(x_country_night), 1) x_country_night, sum(tos_ldgs_day) tos_ldgs_day, sum(tos_ldgs_night) tos_ldgs_night, round(sum(nvl(day_solo,0)+nvl(day_dual,0)+nvl(night_solo,0)+nvl(night_dual,0)), 1) total_month from flight_log group by trunc(flight_date, 'month') ) select row_number() over (order by month) as id, flmtni."MONTH",flmtni."DAY_SOLO",flmtni."DAY_DUAL",flmtni."NIGHT_SOLO",flmtni."NIGHT_DUAL",flmtni."INSTRUMENT_SIMULATED",flmtni."INSTRUMENT_FLIGHT_SIM",flmtni."INSTRUMENT_IMC",flmtni."INSTRUMENT_NO_IFR_APPR",flmtni."X_COUNTRY_DAY",flmtni."X_COUNTRY_NIGHT",flmtni."TOS_LDGS_DAY",flmtni."TOS_LDGS_NIGHT",flmtni."TOTAL_MONTH" from flight_log_monthly_total_no_id flmtni order by id
